reviews.review_msg: Don't really get all the awful ratings he gets. As long as you do your work you will be fine in his class, he is willing to talk things through about the class which will help you get a better grade if you take his advice and use it.

Professor will give the outline 1 week before, you preview that, you may not need to listen in class because he would read through words. Class is BORING and MCQ & T/F Quizzes at the end of lectures. Midterm and Final also are pop quizzes, but the score he gave will give you a surprise.
